title.narrative: TB Control Eastern Equatoria and Upper Nile

description.narrative: The project is funded by Global Fund through UNDP as the fund managers to support implementing partners who are Cordaid and AAA in South Sudan.The project intervention targets TB and HIV as communicable disease for managements in 44 health facilities.The project emphasized integration and expanding access of quality TB and HIV service through use of Genexpert as the baseline examination or microscopy for diagnosis of TB and management of MDR in selected location and facilities in South Sudan working through Ministry of Health South Sudan
The project was aimed at expanding and enhancing quality TB prevention, care and control services in South Sudan

The project will target to offer service to all populace reeached directly and influenced by indirectly by our services segregated by all gender and ages,male and female,boys and girls including the mostly vulnerable groups like persons with disabilities,elderly,refugees,returnees and internally displaced persons.The project will to collect and analyse data so that it can be disaggregated as much as possible by gender, age and any other social construct that inform programme decision-making and implementation.

participating-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

mailing-address.narrative: Grote Marktstraat 45, Den Haag, Zuid Holland, 2511 BH
